item.title: Tropical storm warnings extended up to North Carolina as Chantal approaches
item.description: Tropical storm warnings were extended up to Surf City, North Carolina, as Tropical Storm Chantal is offshore of the southeastern U.S. on Saturday.

item.title: Texas flooding updates: Abbott says 850 rescued as 27 still missing
item.description: Dozens of people have died after heavy rain pounded Kerr County, Texas, early Friday, leading to "catastrophic" flooding, the sheriff said.

item.title: Bobby Jenks, 2-time All-Star closer with Chicago White Sox, dies at 44
item.description: Jenks died in Sintra, Portugal, where he was being treated for stomach cancer.
